footer_0.name: html

vars.payload:
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
  var firstSection = document.querySelector('.subject_section:not(.intro_only)'),
      hasQuiz = (document.querySelector('.intro_only .pb_feed') !== null) ? true : false,
      kids, n=0, node;

  if (hasQuiz === false && firstSection !== null) {
    kids = Array.prototype.slice.apply(firstSection.childNodes);

    for (;n<kids.length;n++) {
      node = kids[n]
      if (/no_image/.test(node.className)) {
          var subjectImage = document.querySelector('.subject_image');
          subjectImage.className = subjectImage.className.replace(/hide/g, '');
          break;
      }
    }
  }
});
</script>

footer_0.description: Simply places a block on the page with whatever HTML (or css and javascript) is configured. Tokens available: {CURRENT_URL}

footer_1.name: html

vars.payload:
<script>
	var colorObj = {
		red: '#f44848',
		orange: '#ffb983',
		pink: '#ffa159',
		purple: '#9e9ed8',
		yellow: '#fee24a',
		green: '#66c768'
	};

	var colorName = [
			'red',
			'orange',
			'pink',
			'purple',
			'yellow',
			'green'
		];

	function getColor (ch) {
		var ch = ch || 'a';
		return (ch.charCodeAt() % (colorName.length));
	}

	var color = colorName[getColor(location.pathname.split(/\//).splice(-1)[0][0])];

	document.body.className += ' ' + color;
</script>

footer_1.description: Simply places a block on the page with whatever HTML (or css and javascript) is configured. Tokens available: {CURRENT_URL}

footer_2.name: html

vars.payload:
<script>
    var adx = Array.prototype.slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('.adx')),
    invalid = [],
    valid = [];

    adx.forEach(function (node) {
        var prevNode;

        if (/no-vis/.test(node.className)) {
            prevNode = node.previousElementSibling;

            //console.info(node);

            //console.info('Is prevNode a module? :: %s', (/module/.test(prevNode.className) == true));
            //console.info('Is prevNode empty? :: %s', (prevNode.innerHTML.replace(/\s/g, '').length === 0));
            //console.info('Is prevNode supposed to be hidden? :: %s', (/hide/.test(prevNode.className) === true));
            //console.info('Is prevNode an ad? :: %s', (/ad/.test(prevNode.className) === true));

            if (((/module/.test(prevNode.className) === true) && ((/ad/.test(prevNode.className) === true) || (prevNode.innerHTML.replace(/\s/g, '').length === 0) || (/hide/.test(prevNode.className) === true)))) {
                //console.info('Pushing to invalid');
                invalid.push(node);
            } else {
                //console.info('Pushing to valid');
                valid.push(node);
            }
            //console.info('----');
        }
    });

    $(function () {
        valid.forEach(function (node, idx) {
            if (idx > 1) {
                return $(node).trigger('addContent');
            }

            if (/no-vis/.test(node.className)) {
                return $(node).trigger('build');
            }
        });
    });
    </script>
